overview:
Joanne Bradford serves as executive vice president of Spot Runner. Prior to that, Bradford was corporate vice president and chief media officer of MSN Media Networks. During her appointment, she led global product and platform development, content and programming, business development, product management, marketing, and branded entertainment for MSN. Before, Bradford also served as Microsoftâ€™s corporate vice president of global sales and marketing and chief media revenue officer. During that time, she managed Microsoft Digital Advertising Solutions across all Microsoft properties, including MSN, Windows Live, OfficeLive.com, Microsoft.com, Xbox, the Microsoft TV Internet Protocol Television Edition software platform and mobile content.

Before joining Microsoft in 2001, Bradford was vice president and director of North American advertising sales at BusinessWeek magazine.

Source: Microsoft
